Welcome to AssimpKit's documentation!
=====================================

AssimpKit is an open source library `hosted on Github`_ that converts 30 3D file
formats using `Assimp`_ to `Scene Kit`_ scenes.

.. _hosted on github: https://github.com/dmsurti/AssimpKit
.. _Assimp: https://github.com/assimp/assimp
.. _Scene Kit: https://developer.apple.com/reference/scenekit

The main documentation for this library is split into:

* :ref:`user-docs`
* :ref:`dev-docs`
* :ref:`dessert-docs`
